nodes.text: Kueget LN-21 blaster pistols were weapons used by Alderaanian security personnel. The pistols were sleek, and could fire blaster bolts as well as stun bolts and blasts. In order to prevent the weapons from falling into the wrong hands, they were equipped with various safety mechanisms, such as key locks. Transponders were also installed in each pistol so that the authorities could track each gun.
At least one Kueget fired stun blasts exclusively, and was used by Bail Organa during the Clone Wars.
